name: Rise Up!
storyline: You play as Ian, the civilian Environmental Director of the space station Alma Con. The station is reeling from a devastating collision with a piece of space junk. Ian is one of the few remaining survivors. With limited resources and an admiral hell-bent on sabotaging your efforts, you must make critical decisions in the race to rebuild Space Station Alma Con.
summary: Rise Up!, a space adventure and survival game with hints of 4x that tests your strategic abilities and challenges your entrepreneurial skills. Scavenge for supplies. Recover and repurpose the mangled bits of robots and equipment. Repair and fly your drone before mining asteroids. Build your empire. Collect achievement badges as you progress. Rise Up! contains stunning visuals and an original soundtrack. The game also includes free updates and players will have the opportunity to make decisions on future updates.
